metadata.title: CVE-2019-2393 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of serviceby issuing specially crafted queries, which use $lookup and collations.This issue affects: MongoDB Inc. MongoDB Server v4.2 versions prior to4.2.1; v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.13; v3.6 versions prior to 3.6.15.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
